igt.tag-types: L+LN G B B B M M M M M M B M B B B B L G T

tier.item: b. %...za da ostavi edno pismo na B
With neuter nouns the Acc forms of the article are equivalent to the Nom forms.
In Bulgarian the Acc forms of the nouns are dialectal (cf. Tilkov (1982-83: 113). In Macedonian,
the nouns denoting family relationships in the Acc case have to be modified by possessive clitics
`... in order to leave a letter to uncle Mosko.'
b. %...za da ostavi edno pismo na B

`... in order to leave a letter to uncle Mosko.'
